00030 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module ) {
00031     m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(module);
00032     if (m_module)
00033         SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00034 }
00035 
00037 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( const CSwordLDKey &k ) : SWKey((const char*)k), CSwordKey(k) {
00038 }
00039 
00041 CSwordLDKey::CSwordLDKey( const SWKey *k, CSwordModuleInfo* module) : SWKey(*k), CSwordKey(module) {
00042 //  m_module = module;
00043 }

00049 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::copy() const {
00050     return new CSwordLDKey(*this);
00051 }
00052 
00054 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordLDKey::module(CSwordModuleInfo* newModule){ 
00055     if (newModule && newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon) {
00056         const QString oldKey = key();   
00057         m_module = newModule;
00058         key(oldKey);
00059     }   
00060     return m_module;
00061 }
00062 
00064 const QString CSwordLDKey::key( const QString& newKey ){
00065     if (!newKey.isNull()) {
00066         SWKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());        
00067         m_module->module()->SetKey(this);
00068         m_module->snap();
00069         SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00070     }
00071     return QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*this);//don't use fromUtf8
00072 }
00073 
00075 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::NextEntry(){
00076     m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!        
00077     ( *( m_module->module() ) )++;
00078     key(m_module->module()->KeyText());
00079     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());  
00080     
00081     return this;
00082 }
00083 
00085 CSwordLDKey* CSwordLDKey::PreviousEntry(){
00086     m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!        
00087     ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00088     SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());  
00089     
00090     return this;
00091 }
00092 
00094 void CSwordLDKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00095     if (newKey) {
00096         SWKey::operator = (newKey);
00097 
00098         m_module->module()->SetKey(this);
00099         m_module->snap();
00100         SWKey::operator = (m_module->module()->KeyText());
00101     }
00102 }
